name: BOOM BINGO KENO: Live Video
description:
Play the only LIVE VIDEO BINGO KENO game for FREE!

Boom Bingo Keno brings you the experience of playing BINGO with a TWIST, so you can play with your FRIENDS, anytime, anywhere! Download Boom Bingo Keno now!

BOOM BINGO KENO FEATURES:

• LIVE VIDEO BINGO KENO with LIVE CALLERS!
• Beat your friends on the leaderboard to win DAILY PRIZES!
• Win HUGE JACKPOTS in 20 numbers or less!
• A variety of FUN Mini Games!
• Chat with other players & make friends from around the world!
• Connect with Facebook to play on different devices!

BINGO TO THE TOP
- BINGO your way to HUGE WINS while collecting achievements and becoming #1 on the LEADERBOARDS.

BOOM BINGO COMMUNITY
- Chat and play against players from around the world for FREE and receive gifts from friends!

PLAY MINI GAMES AS YOU BINGO!
- DOUBLE your chances to win COLOSSAL JACKPOTS from a selection of ENTERTAINING MINI GAMES like Scratch Cards, Pull Tabs, Slots, Money Wheel, Rapid Bingo and Dice while you play Bingo Keno!

CROSS-PLATFORM PLAY
- Connect on any platform with your account, so you can play anytime, anywhere!

LIKE US: www.facebook.com/boomgamingcommunity
FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/boomgamingnews
WATCH US: www.youtube.com/user/boomgamingvideos

DON’T MISS OUT!
Don’t miss some of our other FUN and EXCITING BINGO games, from Character Bingo, Bingo Keno, Beach Bingo and more - get them NOW!

The games on this platform are intended for an adult audience and are for entertainment purposes only. The games do not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gambling does not imply future success at real money gambling.
